casebody.data:
HOUSING AUTHORITY
v.
CREECH. No. 114P07-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 27, 2008. Robert Spence, Jr., Smithfield, for Smithfield Housing Authority.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th day of March 2008 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 27th day of March 2008."
